article.title: Welcome to the West Tennessee – Memphis U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.summary: Learn more about the West Tennessee – Memphis U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​Enter new export markets faster and more profitably with our worldwide network!

Whether you're exporting for the first time or want to increase your exports to new markets, the U.S. Commercial Service can provide customized solutions to help you compete and win in the global marketplace. Our trade specialists in over 100 U.S. cities and more than 150 overseas offices in 85 countries can help you succeed.

West Tennessee companies can access the U.S. Commercial Service's worldwide network by contacting:

David Spann, USEAC Director

Phone: 901-544-0930
Email:david.spann@trade.gov
​​

Memphis U.S. Export Assistance Center

22 North Front Street, Suite 200
Memphis, TN 38103
Phone: 901-543-3510
Website: http://www.export.gov/tennessee/memphis​

The Memphis office services the following counties: Benton, Carroll, Chester, Crockett, Decatur, Dyer, Fayette, Gibson, Hardeman, Hardin, Haywood, Henderson, Henry, Lauderdale, Madison, McNairy, Obion, Shelby, Tipton and Weakley.

For assistance in Arkansas contact:Little Rock US Export Assistance Center

For assistance in Mississippi contact:Jackson US Export Assistance Center
